plot: An eccentric bon vivant plans the perfect Halloween party, but his gala goes to hell when it's crashed by intergalactic parasites - which turn the guests into bloodthirsty vampires.
title: Bed Bugs from Outer Space!
plot_es: An eccentric bon vivant plans the perfect Halloween party, but his gala goes to hell when it's crashed by intergalactic parasites - which turn the guests into bloodthirsty vampires.
plot_en: An eccentric bon vivant plans the perfect Halloween party, but his gala goes to hell when it's crashed by intergalactic parasites - which turn the guests into bloodthirsty vampires.
